snippet.title: Ghost Of Wynlow Trailer
snippet.description:
Now Available: https://azagamestudio.itch.io/ghost-of-wynlow

An urban explorer ventures out to explore and investigate the legend of the abandoned Wynlow lighthouse. Many years ago a old woman took her own life by jumping from the top of the lighthouse, ever since this tragedy occurred people have been 
claiming the location is haunted by her presence.

FEATURES
    Realistic solo urban exploration simulation feeling
    Use your B/W camera mode to unveil secrets unseen to the naked eye.
    Orange sepia camera mode
    Limited camera blitz mechanic
    Photorealistic graphics and VHS Found Footage theme
    Realistic immersive audio design
    Multiple endings - 2 different possible endings with real life footage
    Randomized audio pooling system
    Randomized paranormal events & scare events
    Find paranormal hotspots using your spiritbox
    Explore a haunted lighthouse inspired by a real abandoned lighthouse

Created by Aza Game Studio
All rights reserved ©

Follow: https://twitter.com/AzaGameStudio

Itch: https://azagamestudio.itch.io/
